To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"getRoleMember(bytes32,uint256)":{"details":"Returns one of the accounts that have `role`. `index` must be a value between 0 and {getRoleMemberCount}, non-inclusive. Role bearers are not sorted in any particular way, and their ordering may change at any point. WARNING: When using {getRoleMember} and {getRoleMemberCount}, make sure you perform all queries on the same block. See the following https://forum.openzeppelin.com/t/iterating-over-elements-on-enumerableset-in-openzeppelin-contracts/2296[forum post] for more information."},"getRoleMemberCount(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the number of accounts that have `role`. Can be used together with {getRoleMember} to enumerate all bearers of a role."},"grantRecyclerRole(address)":{"params":{"_userAccount":"The EOA of the user that must be added as recycler."}},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`."},"revokeRecyclerRole(address)":{"params":{"_recycler":"The EOA of the recycler that must be removed."}},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role."},"sellSecondHandCloth(uint256,uint256,uint8,uint8,string,bytes)":{"details":"This method removes a cloth from the dealer's inventory and devdoc.author: LINKS Foundation

params._clothId: The unique id which identifies the saleable cloth.

params._regenerationCreditAddress: The address of the RegenerationCredit smart contract.
params._resellingCreditAddress: The address of the ResellingCredit smart contract.

params._clothesTypes: The type of the cloth to put on sale.
params._confidentialTxHash: The public tx hash generated for the confidential tx.
params._quantities: The list of clothes types quantities.

evaluateBox(uint256,uint256).details: This method needs that the dealer gives an amount of RSC tokens allowance to the contract itself.

params._boxId: The unique id which identifies the box.
params._extraAmountRSC: An extra amount of RSC tokens ad additional reward for the customer.

returns._0: List of the every Box id.
List of the every purchased SaleableCloth id.
List of the every SaleableCloth id.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

getRoleMember(bytes32,uint256).details: Returns one of the accounts that have `role`. `index` must be a value between 0 and {getRoleMemberCount}, non-inclusive. Role bearers are not sorted in any particular way, and their ordering may change at any point. WARNING: When using {getRoleMember} and {getRoleMemberCount}, make sure you perform all queries on the same block. See the following https://forum.openzeppelin.com/t/iterating-over-elements-on-enumerableset-in-openzeppelin-contracts/2296[forum post] for more information.

getRoleMemberCount(bytes32).details: Returns the number of accounts that have `role`. Can be used together with {getRoleMember} to enumerate all bearers of a role.

params._userAccount: The EOA of the user that must be added as recycler.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`.

params._recycler: The EOA of the recycler that must be removed.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

sellSecondHandCloth(uint256,uint256,uint.details: This method removes a cloth from the dealer's inventory and creates a new SaleableCloth for the customers.

params._clothId: The unique id which identifies the saleable cloth.
params._clothSize: The size of the cloth to put on sale.
params._clothType: The type of the cloth to put on sale.
params._description: A short description of the cloth.
params._extClothDataHash: A hash of the external data related to the cloth.
params._rscPrice: The price expressed as an amount of RSC.

sellUpcycledCloth(uint256,uint256,uint8,.details: This method requires the tx hash relative to the confidential transaction where the dealer bought the recycler cloth.

params._clothId: The unique id which identifies the saleable cloth.
params._clothSize: The size of the cloth to put on sale.
params._clothType: The type of the cloth to put on sale.
params._description: A short description of the cloth.
params._extClothDataHash: A hash of the external data related to the cloth.
params._rscPrice: The price expressed as an amount of RSC.

params._boxId: The unique id which identifies the box.
params._clothesTypes: A list indicating the types of clothes inside the box.
params._description: A short description of the box.
params._quantities: A list indicating the quantities of clothes for each type inside the box.

params._confidentialTxHash: The public tx hash generated for the confidential tx.
params._rgcAmount: The RGC tokens amount to transfer.

params._confidentialTxHash: The public tx hash generated for the confidential tx.
params._rscAmount: The RSC tokens amount to transfer.

boxToSecondHandClothes.details: Associate a unique box id to a list of second-hand clothes (i.e., contained in the box).

clothTypeToEvaluationPrice.details: Associate a cloth type to its evaluation price defined in RSC token amount.

customerToBoxesIds.details: Associate a unique EOA of a Customer to the list of his/her Box ids.

customerToPurchasedClothesIds.details: Associate a unique EOA of a Customer to the list of his/her purchased SaleableCloth ids.

idToBox.details: Associate a unique id to a specific box.

idToSaleableCloth.details: Associate a unique saleable cloth id to its data.

inventory.details: Associate a unique cloth type to the related quantity inside the dealer inventory (i.e., aggregated second-hand clothes quantities).

devdoc.title: The Reclothes Shop core and public business logic.

buyCloth(uint256).notice: Buy a saleable cloth using RSC tokens.

methods.constructor: Deploy a new Reclothes Shop associating it to the tokens contracts.

decreaseStockForConfidentialBox(uint8[],.notice: Decrease the inventory stock quantity for the clothes types involved in a confidential box.

evaluateBox(uint256,uint256).notice: Evaluate a box of second-hand clothes and remunerate with RSC tokens the box sender.

getAllCustomerBoxesIds(address).notice: Return every Box id sent from the customer.

getAllPurchasedClothesIds(address).notice: Return every SaleableCloth id purchased by the customer.

grantRecyclerRole(address).notice: Register a new Recycler in to the system.

registerAsCustomer().notice: Assign the Customer role to the sender

renounceToCustomerRole().notice: Removes the Customer role from the sender.

revokeRecyclerRole(address).notice: Remove a Recycler user from the system.

sellSecondHandCloth(uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Put on sale a second-hand cloth.

sellUpcycledCloth(uint256,uint256,uint8,.notice: Put on sale a new upcycled cloth.

sendBoxForEvaluation(uint256,string,uint.notice: Send a box of second-hand clothes from customer to dealer.

transferRGCForConfidentialTx(uint256,str.notice: Transfer a RGC amount from recycler to dealer related to a confidential box evaluation tx.

transferRSCForConfidentialTx(address,uin.notice: Transfer a RSC token amount from dealer to recycler for an upcycled cloth purchase involved in a confidential tx.

userdoc.notice: This contract enables Customers and Reclothes Dealer to transact and cooperate on buy/sell second-hand clothes.This contract guarantee data consistency reflecting the public output of the confidential transactions between Recyclers and Reclothes Dealer.
